channel.title: Rune-VikingRSPS Support
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]Rune-VikingRSPS[/b][/size] [b][i][size=12pt]Developed by Gold Gold Go(Rookierook)[/size][/i][/b]
Hello people from Moparscape Forum Im a little bit new in posting and making an actual RSPS, Remember those old days in 2009-2007 when RSPS was really decent with minig-games and pking with some Custom wepons and others in the game? [size=18pt]WELL[/size] I have found something similar to those ages for a RSPS and I would like to put it ONLINE and bring it back to life As a First time owner and coder of Rune-VikingRSPS I have some decent coding skills but i need people like you with other skills in supporting us to make it as fun as it can be. I dont want this Server to be Very known but i just want everyone when they log in and play i want them to have fun.
So if anyone is interested in Supporting Rune-VikingRSPS PLEASE SEND ME A MESSAGE ON MOPARSCAPE FORUM and i will get back to you as soon as possible
I am looking for some coders and web developers who has the skill in
[b]Adding npc [/b] [b]Adding items[/b] [b]Adding Some decent quests(in-game)[/b] [b]Adding some decent minigames with rewards items shops[/b] [b]Adding voting reward and donation reward and eventually pking rewards[/b] And any other ideas will be usefull too
Credits will be on all of you and youll always be a staff member IN-GAME AND [b]Forum[/b]
Thanks very much lets have fun and make others have fun :D

item.title: Rune-VikingRSPS Support
item.dc:creator: @rookierook rookierook
item.description:
@rookierook wrote:

[size=12pt]Rune-VikingRSPS[/size]
[size=12pt]Developed by Gold Gold Go(Rookierook)[/size]

Hello people from Moparscape Forum Im a little bit new in posting and making an actual RSPS, Remember those old days in 2009-2007 when RSPS was really decent with minig-games and pking with some
Custom wepons and others in the game?
[size=18pt]WELL[/size] I have found something similar to those ages for a RSPS and I would like to put it ONLINE and bring it back to life
As a First time owner and coder of Rune-VikingRSPS I have some decent coding skills but i need people like you with other skills in supporting us to make it as fun as it can be. I dont want this Server to be Very known but i just want everyone when they log in and play i want them to have fun.

So if anyone is interested in Supporting Rune-VikingRSPS PLEASE SEND ME A MESSAGE ON MOPARSCAPE FORUM and i will get back to you as soon as possible

I am looking for some coders and web developers who has the skill in

Adding npc
Adding items
Adding Some decent quests(in-game)
Adding some decent minigames with rewards items shops
Adding voting reward and donation reward and eventually pking rewards
And any other ideas will be usefull too

Credits will be on all of you and youll always be a staff member IN-GAME AND Forum

Thanks very much lets have fun and make others have fun
